price: 7. ¿Por qué no has venido a nosotros con ángeles, si eres de los veraces?”.
arabic: لَّوۡمَا تَأۡتِينَا بِٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: law mā tatīnā bil-malāikati in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
